subject: Re: Santa Rosa Laptops
body:
On 1 Jul 2007 08:20:06 GMT Jack Malmostoso wrote:

> The few howtos about thinkpads seem conflicting with each other, so I'd 
> like to know if someone has a success story to share.

I have successfully installed Sid on a SR-Samsung last week.
But the Debian images did not want to boot, so I got grml-small,
booted and did the rest with debootstrap.
S-ATA and stuff is working fine, the new wifi does not (did not have
the time to build the iwl modules on my own).

Regards & HTH
Evgeni
